description: Change parameter kind to keyword-only: a series of functions under astroquery.mast
Add required parameter: YataiClientContext.__init__(email) in dataclass
Rename parameter: Connection.__init__(service: cls -> root: obj)
Remove scrapy.utils.python: isbinarytext, is_writable, setattr_default, stringify_dict
Rename unicode_urlencode->url_quote, Remove Markup.escape from MarkupSafe
Index.get_indexer_for() no longer accepts keyword arguments
Change in the position of the min_rows argument in DataFrame.to_string
semilogx, semilogy, loglog, LogScale, and SymmetricalLogScale used to take keyword arguments (basex vs basey, ...) which have been removed in favor of base, subs, nonpositive
DatabaseOperations.year_lookup_bounds_for_date_field() and year_lookup_bounds_for_datetime_field() methods now take the optional iso_year argument
The second argument of DatabaseSchemaEditor._unique_sql() and _create_unique_sql() methods is now fields instead of columns
now users have to provide most parameters with their names, as keyword arguments, instead of positional arguments
